workshopData.title: GitHub Workshop
workshopData.description: Not very familiar with GitHub and you need it for this hackathon? Don‚Äôt worry, BeachHacks got you! Come to our first workshop of the day where you will learn about the basics of Github. By the end of the session, you will learn how to navigate Github confidently!

workshopData.title: Video Game Development
workshopData.description: Interested in learning about video game development? VGDA is hosting a workshop to help you learn about video game development.

workshopData.title: Hardware Workshop
workshopData.description: Software needs hardware and hardware needs software to run. Come to the hardware workshop to learn more about what hardware has to offer.

workshopData.title: LinkedIn Workshop
workshopData.description: Come and learn more about what Linkedin Learning has to offer for you!

workshopData.title: Technical Interview Workshop
workshopData.description: Are you preparing for upcoming technical interviews? Come to our technical interview workshop where we will give you tips on how to improve your technical interview to secure that job/internship üí∞

saturdayData.title: Opening Ceremony
saturdayData.description: Join us at our ceremony to learn more about rules, prizes and events we have planned out for BeachHacks 7.0! Additionally, Micheal Botsko will be our opening keynote speaker. He has years of experience in the EdTech industry. Michael was also the founder of BeachHacks and the president of ACM!

saturdayData.title: Hacking Begins!
saturdayData.description: Show off your python Skills in a collaborative project. Up to 5 team members using the python programming language

saturdayData.title: Cup Stacking
saturdayData.description: Wanna improve your motor skills and hand-eye coordination? We have cup stacking game waiting for you to play against other participants.

saturdayData.title: How to get most of your hackathon project to land your dream job
saturdayData.description: Want to learn how to make yourself stand out with the hackathon project you‚Äôre coding right now? Well, this is the event for you to attend! Christian Bourdeau will be our keynote speaker. He has many years of experience as an analytic engineer under his belt. Christian has worked in different companies such as Nike, PlayStation and more. Currently he is working with Netflix.

saturdayData.title: Social/Networking
saturdayData.description: Need a break from coding? Come to our social/networking event where you will meet new friends and bond through playing fun games‚ù§Ô∏è

saturdayData.title: Hacking...
saturdayData.description: If you need any information regarding workshops, please don‚Äôt hesitate to ask one of the volunteers. Have fun coding!

sundayData.title: Lunch
sundayData.description: Don‚Äôt forget to fill up your stomach with food before you continue coding!

sundayData.title: Alumni Career Panel
sundayData.description: Wonder what working in the professional industries are like? Come to our career panel to hear from our alumni about their experience.

sundayData.title: Hacking Ends! (4PM) / Judging Begins
sundayData.description: Good job! Now it‚Äôs time to relax and wait for the result. Judging is in the process‚Ä¶

sundayData.title: Closing Ceremony

Additionally, Christian Bourdeau will be our closing keynote speaker. He has many years of experience as an analytic engineer under his belt. Christian has worked in different companies such as Nike, PlayStation and more. Currently he is working with Netflix.
